backend/main.mo: Defines user authentication, profiles, roles, onboarding state, and job application management using maps and authorization/storage mixins.
feature_evidence.json: Lists feature evidence entries mapping feature requirements to impacted frontend files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Provides short descriptions of multiple frontend files covering routing, auth, onboarding, and role-specific flows.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base and component layers plus CSS variables for light and dark themes.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point loading the React app via main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router routes and wraps the app with auth and backend actor providers.
frontend/src/components/AppHeader.tsx: Header displaying the app title and logout button when authenticated.
frontend/src/components/AppLayout.tsx: Layout wrapper providing header, optional navigation, main content area, and footer.
frontend/src/components/AppNav.tsx: Navigation bar showing role‑specific navigation actions for job seekers or recruiters.
frontend/src/components/AsyncFallbackSta: Reusable component for loading, error, and empty states with optional actions and navigation helpers.
frontend/src/features/actor/actorInitRet: Implements a retry policy with exponential backoff for async initialization tasks.
frontend/src/features/actor/BackendActor: Provides a React context that initializes and manages a backend actor with retry logic and exposes readiness state.
frontend/src/features/auth/AuthContext.t: Provides authentication state with login/logout and persists user email in session storage.
frontend/src/features/auth/LoginPage.tsx: Login UI that authenticates users through the backend actor and handles initialization and retry states.
frontend/src/features/auth/RequireAuth.t: Higher-order component that redirects unauthenticated users to the login page.
frontend/src/features/auth/SignupPage.ts: Signup form that registers new users through the backend actor and handles initialization state.
frontend/src/features/jobSeeker/JobSeeke: Job application form for job seekers allowing location entry and photo upload before submitting via the backend.
UI page for job seekers to view and edit their application, handle photo upload, and save updates via backend actor.
frontend/src/features/jobSeeker/useMyApp: React Query hook fetching the current user's job application, handling backend Result types and loading states.
frontend/src/features/onboarding/Locatio: Onboarding form for submitting user location and routing users based on assigned role.
frontend/src/features/onboarding/Require: Wrapper enforcing onboarding steps with redirects and fallback states for loading or errors.
frontend/src/features/onboarding/RoleSel: Page allowing users to choose their role and persist it, handling backend errors and session issues.
frontend/src/features/onboarding/useOnbo: Hook that loads the user's profile with React Query and exposes onboarding progress and status flags.
frontend/src/features/recruiter/Recruite: Recruiter page listing applicants filtered by location, with loading/error handling and fallback states.
frontend/src/features/recruiter/useAppli: Hook querying applicants near the recruiter's location using backend search and exposing query state.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user’s Internet Identity, refreshing dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides context and hooks for managing Internet Identity authentication, including login, logout, and stored identity loading.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Placeholder file for future React Query hooks, currently only imports common utilities.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles and CSS variables for light and dark themes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/WelcomePage.tsx: Renders a styled welcome screen with navigation to the login page.
frontend/src/utils/backendErrors.ts: Maps backend error codes to readable messages and actions, and provides helpers for handling result types.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utilities for reading, persisting, and clearing URL and session parameters.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind theme extensions, color tokens, plugins, and dark mode settings.
project_state.json: Describes the app’s current project state, including features, architecture notes, and known issues related to login, role selection, and loading behavior. Serves as a fix request containing requirements for authentication, onboarding, and recruiter/job seeker flows.
